title: didya think
lyrics:
Never thought you'd be the kinda guy to get a day job
9 to 5 you're gonna take off
You're gonna go against the grain
Never thought you'd be the kinda guy to take a safe route
By and by you're gonna break out

The world's gonna know your name



So why ya sittin' around?

Didya think it'd be easy?

I'll tell you if it was easy

Then everybody'd do it too



You say you haven't got the kinda time to take a beach day

'Cause you're too busy every weekday

To ever get up off your chair



You say you haven't got the kinda time to get a girlfriend

'Cause you're too busy every weekend

You haven't got a second to spare



So why ya sittin' around?

Didya think it'd be easy?

I'll tell you if it was easy

Then everybody'd do it too



You say you're gonna leave the hard knock life behind

You're gonna hitch your little wagon up to a star

You say you're gonna take the road less traveled by

You don't seem to be traveling very far



Never thought you'd be the kinda guy to get a day job

9 to 5 you're gonna take off

You're going to go against the grain



So why ya sittin' around?

Didya think it'd be easy?

I'll tell you if it was easy

Then everybody'd do it too



You say you're chasing a dream?

Well, you'd better get moving

Every second you waste, the world you're trying to chase

Gets away from you
